165931.<pc>が 足元を調べてみると\nつぼみをとざした植物が 見つかった。\n<br:
tried examining around their feet, and discovered closed-up flowers.
decided to wait until night, when the flowers were said to open.

165932.…………。\n<br>\n……………………。\n<br>\n夜になってから 足元:
...... .........
After it became night, they tried examining around their feet, and discovered flowers blooming in the dim light given off by the minerals in the wall!
obtained the Zoomoon Grass (Key Item)!
